programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson(n)

programme.title: Chris Rock
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews comedian and actor Chris Rock, who talks about his influences including his minister grandfather and Eddie Murphy, the type of material that plays across all cultural boundaries, his respect for Bill Cosby and Richard Pryor, and his struggle for fame and success in the years after he left "Saturday Night Live."(n)

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar(n)

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn(n)

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate navigates emotional and cultural land mines when she accepts a position as nanny to the spoiled, bratty child of a demanding, wealthy Manhattan couple in this comedy based on the best-selling novel. Scarlett Johansson, Laura Linney, Paul Giamatti, Chris Evans, Alicia Keys and Nicholas Art star(n)

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute(n)

programme.title: Dazed and Confused
programme.desc: It's the last day of high school before summer vacation somewhere in middle America - 1976. The story follows the conflicts faced by Randy "Pink" Floyd, Mitch Kramer, Sabrina, Slater, Mike, and Wooderson. When the day dawns on the football field where several of them have gathered, the future might look bleak, but not totally without hope. Like it or not, the forced environment and resultant camaraderie that school has created for them is the closest thing they've known to home during these "best years" of their lives(n)

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver(n)

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly(n)

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate navigates emotional and cultural land mines when she accepts a position as nanny to the spoiled, bratty child of a demanding, wealthy Manhattan couple in this comedy based on the best-selling novel. Scarlett Johansson, Laura Linney, Paul Giamatti, Chris Evans, Alicia Keys and Nicholas Art star(n)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: Al Madrigal: Shrimpin' Ain't Easy
programme.desc: Former 'Daily Show with Jon Stewart' correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics like cilantro politics, anger management, and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge in this stand-up comedy special

programme.title: Submission of Emma Marx 3: Exposed
programme.desc: In the third film in this series about a beautiful young woman who enters into an erotic relationship with a mysterious man, their relationship reaches a heightened level of intensity when they go to Atlanta until an unexpected turn leaves her wondering whether she’s really cut out for a BDSM relationship

programme.title: Dane Cook Troublemaker
programme.desc: Comedian Dane Cook knows how to stir it up with his patented brand of observational humor, skewering aspects of modern life, from our hidden Internet selves to gender taboos and everything in between, in this exclusive comedy event

programme.title: W. Kamau Bell: Semi-Prominent Negro
programme.desc: Comedy special featuring socio-political comedian W. Kamau Bell, who brings his characteristically biting and hilarious take on the real issues of contemporary America from gentrification to raising his family in a post-Obama nation. Morgan Spurlock directs

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: A group of aid workers tries to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone as humor, drama, emotion, routine and danger all fit into one perfect day. Stars Benicio Del Toro and Tim Robbins

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as a professional assassin sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb where his ten-year high school reunion is also taking place. There, he must fend off federal agents, a rival assassin, and fulfill a contract to kill, all while trying to win back with his former sweetheart. Also stars Minnie Driver and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Four East end lads (Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, and Jason Statham) try to get sumfin' for nuffin' by entering a high-stakes mobster card game, but soon find themselves half a million pounds in debt to "Hatchet Harry," a local gang-land boss. Tangling those around them in a net of coincidence and misunderstanding, our four heroes must avoid a sure fate of finger amputation - or worse!

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Something has gone wrong at a remote scientific research station on Mars. Sealing off the portal to Earth, Sarge (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson), Reaper (Karl Urban) and their team must use every weapon at their disposal—and some they find along the way—to carry out their orders: nothing gets out alive

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe

programme.title: Alpha Dog
programme.desc: A thuggish group of privileged LA teenagers kidnap the younger brother of a junkie who refuses to pay his drug debt and take the kid to Palm Springs. Stars Justin Timberlake and Bruce Willis

programme.title: How to Be a Player
programme.desc: A playboy whose only objective in life seems to be having sex with as many girls as possible without getting caught has the tables turned on him at a party where all of the women he has been two-timing are in attendance

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: Marlon Wayans stars as Christian Black in a comedy about a millionaire control freak who introduces shy college student Hannah Steele (Kali Hawk) to the world of "romance" after she interviews him for the school newspaper

programme.title: Martin Lawrence: Doin' Time: Uncut
programme.desc: Comedy legend Martin Lawrence returns to the stand-up stage for a night of impressions and insight on everything from sex, relationships and President Obama, to Bill Cosby, Hollywood and more. Filmed live at LA's Orpheum Theatre

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars as an assassin who hides out in an idyllic Italian town, performing one last hit before leaving the death trade in this elegiac thriller from director Anton Corbijn

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: Lush cinematic feat of three interwoven classic Italian fairytales which feature a queen on a bitter quest, two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king and a young daughter who must wrestle with her father’s obsession with a giant flea. Starring Salma Hayek and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Witless Protection
programme.desc: A bumbling deputy (Larry the Cable Guy) mistakes a federal witness for a kidnapping victim and takes her into "protective custody," thereby incurring the wrath of the FBI and a slew of unsavory criminals. Jenny McCarthy costars in this wacky comedy with Peter Stormare, Eric Roberts, Ivana Milicevic, Yaphet Kotto (as the same character he played in "Midnight Run") and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Academy Award winner, Denzel Washington, is Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer whose dreams are destroyed when he's wrongfully accused of murder. Carter is sentenced to three life terms in prison, where he decides to channel his frustration and despair by writing his own story from his cell. A teenager reads the autobiography and begins corresponding with him. Convinced of Carter's innocence, the teen enlists his social activist guardians to mount a full-time campaign to prove the truth and get Carter released

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: An ambitious ghost writer (Ewan McGregor) is hired to pen the forthcoming autobiography of a controversial former British prime minister (Pierce Brosnan) but uncovers an incendiary secret from his subject's past that indicates a vast global conspiracy is controlling world events. Olivia Williams costars in this tense thriller from director Roman Polanski

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Robert De Niro as career criminal Nick Wells, a safecracking specialist who allows himself to be pressured into one more heist by his flamboyant mentor (Marlon Brando) and a brilliant but impatient young thief (Edward Norton). Soon they're embroiled in a complex scheme to steal a priceless relic from a Canadian customs house, but revealed secrets and double-crosses are just around the corner

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Fed up with crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers, who are inspired by their faith, decide to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community, with an eccentric FBI agent on their blood-soaked trail. Stars Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice

programme.title: Dolan's Cadillac
programme.desc: Robinson (Wes Bentley) is a law-abiding schoolteacher until his wife Elizabeth unexpectedly witnesses a murder. The killer is Jimmy Dolan (Christian Slater), Las Vegas' most ruthless and untouchable mob boss. Elizabeth agrees to testify, and faces deadly consequences. Devastated by her death, Robinson tries everything to bring Dolan to justice. Without hard evidence however, Dolan remains free. Haunted by the ghost of wife, Robinson transforms himself into a vengeance-obsessed machine, pushing himself beyond the breaking point

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: A police captain (Ethan Hawke) must put together a force of cops and criminals to defend the soon-to-close Precinct 13 when they come under attack by a gang intent on freeing their imprisoned boss (Laurence Fishburne)

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The iron-willed comic book vigilante Frank Castle (a.k.a. "The Punisher") wages a one-man war on the New York mobsters that murdered his family in this action thriller starring Ray Stevenson, Dominic West and Julie Benz(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Robert De Niro as career criminal Nick Wells, a safecracking specialist who allows himself to be pressured into one more heist by his flamboyant mentor (Marlon Brando) and a brilliant but impatient young thief (Edward Norton). programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars as WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange in this dramatic thriller based on real events. In a quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power, an Internet startup becomes the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization(n)

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: When a rising star in the global tech company makes an innocent mistake, he must become a corporate spy to obtain trade secrets from a rival company. But what starts as a clever ruse becomes a life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Stars Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman(n)

programme.title: Dangerous Minds
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer stars in this fact-based drama about a former U.S. Marine who takes on a new civilian mission: teacher at a tough inner-city high school. George Dzundza and Courtney B. Vance costar in this hit that features the smash music single "Gangster's Paradise" by Coolio(n)

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans(n)

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)(n)

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Alexandre Dumas' The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: When the young and dashing Edmond Dantes (Jim Caviezel) is betrayed by his best friend (Guy Pearce) and falsely imprisoned, he becomes consumed by thoughts of vengeance. After a miraculous escape, he transforms himself into the mysterious and wealthy Count of Monte Cristo, insinuates himself into the French nobility and uses a hidden treasure to put his plan of revenge in action

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington

programme.title: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Music legend Bob Dylan flies to London one day to visit his mate Dave Stewart. After getting lost, Bob finally arrives at the address and finds himself waiting for Dave in his flat dutifully being served tea by his girlfriend. But is he really in the right place? Starring Eddie Marsan, Paul Ritter and Katherine Parkinson

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: A young schoolgirl (Keke Palmer) from South Central Los Angeles discovers a secret, surprising talent for spelling that promises to take her to the National Spelling Bee, with the help of a depressed English professor (Laurence Fishburne) and despite the opposition of her strict, disciplinarian mother (Angela Bassett). Curtis Armstrong and J.R. Villarreal costar in this critically acclaimed drama

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: A young schoolgirl (Keke Palmer) from South Central Los Angeles discovers a secret, surprising talent for spelling that promises to take her to the National Spelling Bee, with the help of a depressed English professor (Laurence Fishburne) and despite the opposition of her strict, disciplinarian mother (Angela Bassett). Curtis Armstrong and J.R. Villarreal costar in this critically acclaimed drama

programme.title: It Runs in the Family (2003)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and his legendary actor father Kirk Douglas team up on-screen for the first time with this comedy about a successful businessman whose midlife crisis inspires him to reach out to several generations of his family, with decidedly comic results. Bernadette Peters costars

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: Who's Your Caddy?
programme.desc: Denied membership in an exclusive Hamptons country club, the millionaire rapper C-Note (Antwan Andre Patton) pulls off a clever real estate deal that guarantees him admission but also touches off a war with the club's snobby elite. Jeffrey Jones, Andy Milonakis and Faizon Love costar in this hilarious comedy of golf, rap, and class tension

programme.title: When Time Expires
programme.desc: If futuristic time traveler Richard Grieco fails to place a quarter in a parking meter at precisely the right moment, a series of chain reactions will ultimately result in the destruction of Earth in this sci-fi action thriller costarring Chad Everett and Mark Hamill

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Cut in Half
programme.desc: Two Muslim sisters and their family must cope with the eldest daughter's leukemia diagnosis and her decisions about life and death. Directed by Susan Seidelman (‘Desperately Seeking Susan'). Written by Leen Shumman(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later(n)

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?(n)

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect(n)

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Iris Rainer Dart, BEACHES chronicles the 30-year oil-and-water friendship between free-spirited Bronx Jew CC Bloom (Bette Midler) and uptight San Francisco WASP Hillary Essex (Barbara Hershey). The two meet as children and are reunited in the 1960s, when CC is a struggling singer and Hillary is trying to break free from her staid upbringing by becoming an activist. The two ladies room together, then fall out when both are attracted to the same man - off-Broadway producer John Pierce (John Heard)(n)

programme.title: Three Men And A Baby
programme.desc: Three handsome Manhattan bachelors find their dating and mating rituals irreparably altered when a baby, the lovechild of one of the men, shows up on their doorstep. Stars Tom Selleck, Steve Guttenberg and Ted Danson(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: Alexandre Dumas' The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: When the young and dashing Edmond Dantes (Jim Caviezel) is betrayed by his best friend (Guy Pearce) and falsely imprisoned, he becomes consumed by thoughts of vengeance. After a miraculous escape, he transforms himself into the mysterious and wealthy Count of Monte Cristo, insinuates himself into the French nobility and uses a hidden treasure to put his plan of revenge in action(n)

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: Long Night's Journey Into Day
programme.desc: In the Season 6 premiere, a shocking revelation about the fate of a major character leads to a season-long series of flashbacks that will reveal the events leading up to the tragedy

programme.title: Least Likely
programme.desc: Bette and Tina discuss plans for a new life together, but the reappearance of an old acquaintance of Bette's threatens their future; Tasha and Alice seek counseling for their compatibility issues; an old flame sends Helena reeling(c)

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Iris Rainer Dart, BEACHES chronicles the 30-year oil-and-water friendship between free-spirited Bronx Jew CC Bloom (Bette Midler) and uptight San Francisco WASP Hillary Essex (Barbara Hershey). The two meet as children and are reunited in the 1960s, when CC is a struggling singer and Hillary is trying to break free from her staid upbringing by becoming an activist. The two ladies room together, then fall out when both are attracted to the same man - off-Broadway producer John Pierce (John Heard)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: A young couple live in a broken-down car parked alongside Chicago's Lincoln Park Zoo, spending their days in a ritual of scamming, thieving and scoring heroin to feed their addiction until they must confront the difficult truth about their relationship

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Stars Shirley MacLaine, Jack Black and Matthew McConaughey. Richard Linklater directs

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Split Persona
programme.desc: The bond between twin sisters starts to fray when their mother starts showing signs of suicidal depression. Still, they need each other - but have they grown too far apart? Directed by Bradley Rust Gray. Written by Mayraleeh Nelson

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain
programme.desc: A 12-year-old rich kid cello prodigy wants for nothing but the attention of his absent parents until a young musician is hired as his au pair and an unexpected friendship blossoms. Stars Leighton Meester and Debra Messing

programme.title: All or Nothing
programme.desc: Filmmaker Mike Leigh delivers another glimpse of British working-class life with a moving, humanistic tale capturing both the desperation and bittersweet humor of its subjects' lives. Phil (Timothy Spall), a scruffy cab driver, his common-law life Penny (Lesley Manville) and their two overweight children reside in one of South London's ubiquitous concrete housing developments. When an unexpected crisis descends upon Phil and Penny, they are forced to face and affirm some of life's timeless verities. "Richly satisfying" ("The Guardian")

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication

programme.title: Dangerous Minds
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer stars in this fact-based drama about a former U.S. Marine who takes on a new civilian mission: teacher at a tough inner-city high school. George Dzundza and Courtney B. Vance costar in this hit that features the smash music single "Gangster's Paradise" by Coolio

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: LMFAO
programme.desc: The negative of Jenny's movie goes missing, while Shane's apologies to her are finally noticed; Jenny dismisses Alice's aspiration to write a screenplay; Phyllis shares a secret with Bette; Kit and Helena open a new nightclub(c)

programme.title: Leaving Los Angeles
programme.desc: Shane and Jenny are still melting over each other; Bette and Tina meet a potential birth mother; Max tries to deal with being pregnant; Alice and Tasha play matchmaker; and Kelly Wentworth (Elizabeth Berkley) may have what Bette needs(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: Psychological drama from director Atom Egoyan ("The Sweet Hereafter") stars Elaine Cassidy as Felicia, an Irish girl who follows her boyfriend to England when she discovers she's pregnant with his child. Unsure of his exact whereabouts, Felicia instead comes under the sway of Joseph (Bob Hoskins), a caterer who has a violent secret history with young homeless women just like Felicia. Based on the novel by William Trevor

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two bus crash survivors awake to discover that they are the only people left in their small town, they must form an unlikely alliance in a race to unravel the truth behind their isolation, as a dark fog concealing danger advances towards the town

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world

programme.title: Prophet's Prey
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the shocking life of notorious cult leader Warren Jeffs, and the FLDS Church, who through brainwashing and abuse seized control of his followers' lives and an organization worth hundreds of millions of dollars. While Jeffs is currently serving a life sentence for his crimes, he still exerts total authority over his flock. Features unprecedented interviews with Church insiders and victims, exposing the nightmarish hell of unspeakable crimes that still continue to this day

programme.title: Fried Green Tomatoes
programme.desc: A housewife befriends an old lady in a nursing home and becomes enthralled by the tales she tells of a unique relationship between two women in 1930s Alabama. Academy Award winners Kathy Bates and Jessica Tandy star

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: Casual Sex?
programme.desc: Lea Thompson and Victoria Jackson star in a first-rate sex comedy about two women looking for love at a health resort and confronting the changing sexual attitudes of society. Andrew Dice Clay also stars(n)

programme.title: Litmus Test
programme.desc: Jenny writes another script that sells; Bette and Kelly go into business; Alice and Tasha have a third-wheel crush; the girls plot a sting operation to test Dylan; Jenny encroaches further on Shane(n)

programme.title: Lactose Intolerant
programme.desc: Jenny throws a baby shower for Max; Bette and Tina hit a roadblock in the adoption process; Bette goes solo to her gallery's opening night celebration; Shane is feeling boxed in by Jenny; Alice starts to feel like three is a crowd(n)

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy® and Emmy® nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit(n)

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town(n)

programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret(n)

programme.title: It Runs in the Family (2003)

Bernadette Peters costars(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold

With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family(n)

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City(n)

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible(n)

programme.title: Burning Bodhi
programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart(n)

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as a professional assassin sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb where his ten-year high school reunion is also taking place. There, he must fend off federal agents, a rival assassin, and fulfill a contract to kill, all while trying to win back with his former sweetheart. Also stars Minnie Driver and Dan Aykroyd(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy Night Two with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the second of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Todd Glass, Wyatt Cenac, Iliza Shlesinger, Rachel Feinstein, Nate Bargatze, Matt Braunger, Mark Normand, Beth Stelling, Joe DeRosa and Jon Huck(n)

programme.title: The Lady Eve
programme.desc: An eligible, socially awkward heir to a brewery empire boards a cruise ship bound for New York and soon becomes the target of the single ladies on the vessel, as well as a trio of card sharks out to swindle the pushover out of his money, until one of them starts to fall for him romantically. (cc)

programme.title: Mr. Lucky
programme.desc: To raise dubious funds to buy a casino ship, an opportunistic gambler (Cary Grant) pretends to be working with a World War II relief society, but begins to have second thoughts about the shady deal when he meets and falls for a society woman (Laraine Day). (cc)

programme.title: Nobody Lives Forever
programme.desc: A con man strives to swindle a widow out of her inheritance, but winds up falling in love with her. (cc)

programme.title: Kiss of the Tarantula
programme.desc: Low-budget tale about an undertaker's vengeful daughter (Suzanne Ling), who raises spiders. Walter: Eric Mason. John: Herman Wallner. Nancy: Patricia Landon. Martha: Beverly Eddins. Bo: Jay Scott. (cc)

programme.title: The Bad Seed
programme.desc: Maxwell Anderson's play about a mother (Best Actress nominee Nancy Kelly) who suspects her seemingly perfect little 8-year-old daughter (Best Supporting Actress nominee Patty McCormack) is a ruthless killer. Kelly, McCormack, Henry Jones and Eileen Heckart reprise their roles from the Broadway production, which ends differently from the movie version. (cc)

programme.title: Forever, Darling
programme.desc: A neglected wife's wish that her scientist husband would pay more attention to her is answered in the form of a guardian angel (who looks just like her favorite actor, James Mason, because it is him). (cc)

programme.title: Between Two Worlds
programme.desc: Remake of 1930s "Outward Bound" is an allegorical tale of passengers on a mystery ship that may be a way station between heaven and hell, and where a mysterious gentleman holds sway over who goes to which destination. (cc)

programme.title: They Live by Night
programme.desc: Two young criminal lovebirds try to escape from their past and the law, but find it tough to evade both. (cc)

programme.title: Yankee Doodle Dandy
programme.desc: James Cagney stepped into the shoes of legendary showman George M. Cohan and danced off with a Best Actor Oscar. The film chronicles Cohan's life as he reminisces about his early days in vaudeville to his success on Broadway while preparing to meet President Franklin D. Roosevelt. Rosemary De Camp, who plays George's mother, was actually 15 years younger than Cagney. Cagney played Cohan again in 1955's "The Seven Little Foys." (cc)

programme.title: Viva Las Vegas
programme.desc: Elvis Presley is gonna need a strong heart and nerves of steel to have a swinging time in the Nevada gambling mecca, where he enters his race car in a Grand Prix event, and goes wheel-to-wheel with his archrival as they compete on the track and for the love of a comely singer. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: On the Town
programme.desc: Three footloose sailors revel in a 24-hour liberty in New York City, where each becomes involved in romantic entanglements with some native New Yorkers, including a cabbie, an anthropologist and an aspiring dancer. Features an Oscar-winning score. (cc)

programme.title: Annie Get Your Gun
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Irving Berlin Broadway hit musical about legendary Wild West sharpshooter Annie Oakley, who rose from backwoods gamin to the uppermost rungs of international stardom. An Oscar winner for Best Musical Score. (cc)

programme.title: Places in the Heart
programme.desc: Oscars went to Robert Benton's script and Sally Field's portrait of a farm widow struggling to weather the Depression. Danny Glover, John Malkovich. Margaret: Lindsay Crouse. Wayne: Ed Harris. Viola: Amy Madigan. Frank: Yankton Hatten. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Southerner
programme.desc: A family of determined and resourceful sharecroppers struggle to make a go of it growing cotton in Texas. Jean Renoir, who wrote the script, was Oscar-nominated for Best Director. (cc)

programme.title: Love Among the Ruins
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn and Laurence Olivier won Emmys for this Edwardian comedy of manners about a feisty widow and the barrister who defends her in a breach-of-promise suit. Druce: Richard Pearson. Alfred: Leigh Lawson. Mrs. Pratt: Joan Sims. Filmed in London by Oscar winner George Cukor, who won an Emmy for this film

programme.title: A Man There Was
programme.desc: Silent film adaptation of a Henrik Ibsen poem about a Scandinavian sailor whose wife and child are lost during war, leaving him to wrestle with the opportunity to exact revenge on the enemy responsible

programme.title: I Knew Her Well
programme.desc: A young lady from rural Italy comes to Rome to work in the movie business and discovers the dark side of the industry

programme.title: Le Beau Serge
programme.desc: An ailing Frenchman returns to his rural home town after 12 years to find his childhood friend, once a man of great promise, is now a bitter, alcoholic loser. This was the first film of French critic-turned-director Claude Chabrol, who costars as La Truffe

programme.title: Song Writers' Revue
programme.desc: Short showcase featuring eight composers and lyricists who've written tunes that are now considered American popular standards. Included: Nacio Herb Brown and Arthur Freed, Gus Edwards, Fred Fisher, Ray Egan, Dave Dreyer, Fred Ahlert and Roy Turk. Jack Benny is the emcee. Directed by Sammy Lee

programme.title: The Pagan
programme.desc: South Seas locations highlight this silent film (with musical interludes) about a half-caste (Ramon Novarro) who falls in love with a trader's daughter (Dorothy Janis). Madge: Renee Adoree. Slater: Donald Crisp. Directed by W.S. Van Dyke

programme.title: Student Tour
programme.desc: A reserved philosophy professor gets stuck shepherding a coed college rowing team on a world tour, with specific orders to keep the team's rowdy captain from getting into hot water

programme.title: The Bribe
programme.desc: An FBI agent sets out to track down war-surplus racketeers in Central America, only to fall for a shady woman who is involved in the criminal activity. (cc)

programme.title: The Kissing Bandit
programme.desc: A Boston milquetoast must become a famous California bandit who kisses his female victims. (cc)

programme.title: Andy Hardy's Private Secretary
programme.desc: Andy, about to graduate from high school, tries to help an unfortunate girl. (cc)

When his benefactor goes missing, he spends the next several years dashing from one abandoned home to another, desperate to avoid capture by German occupation troops. (cc)

programme.title: All the President's Men
programme.desc: Washington Post reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein investigate a 1972 burglary at the Democratic National Committee headquarters, eventually discovering a cover-up that would lead to President Richard Nixon's resignation. Adaptation of Woodward and Bernstein's book. (cc)

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: Story of vengeance and redemption following a fender bender that sparks a dangerous game of cat and mouse between two motorists. (cc)

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Men living in a small desert community come upon some inexplicable phenomena, including at least one very grisly body. It turns out that there are gigantic wormlike carnivores living under the desert that come up to feed on humans. (cc)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: The lives of a working-class American, a French journalist and a London schoolboy intersect when their collective grief leads them on a journey to discover the truth about the afterlife. (cc)

programme.title: The Signal
programme.desc: Three students seek a notorious hacker in the Nevada desert, and end up imprisoned in a high-tech government-research facility. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: A complex plot concocted by extraterrestrials is uncovered when an astronomer (Charlie Sheen) discovers an eerie sound on the radio airwaves. Ron Silver. Ilana: Lindsay Crouse. Kiki: Tony T. Johnson. Char: Teri Polo. Written and directed by David Twohy. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: A married couple think they've found a dream house in Amityville, Long Island, but they soon learn that the home has a dark history. A year before, a man living in the house murdered his family in their sleep, claiming he was commanded to commit the crime by demons. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II The Golden Army
programme.desc: Cigar-chomping demon Hellboy, the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense's secret weapon against things that go bump in the night, returns to battle a supernatural prince with an ancient grudge against puny humans. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien from another planet, accompanied by a giant robot, lands on Earth to eradicate the human race because of environmental damage inflicted by mankind on the planet. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: A man (Gene Bervoets) searches for his girlfriend, who mysteriously disappeared during a vacation in France. Johanna Ter Steege, Bernard-Pierre Donnadieu, Gwen Eckhaus. Directed by George Sluizer. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: A driven police detective and his partner track down a major international drug dealer. They begin by following a couple they suspect because the duo lives far above their apparent means. They continue to follow a trail of clues that leads to a French criminal responsible for a large percentage of the drugs that come into New York City. Best Picture winner. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: A cop (Rachel Weisz) tangles with demons and angels when she probes her twin's death with a man (Keanu Reeves) who has literally been to hell and back. Stylized but muddled supernatural thriller based on the “Hellblazer” graphic novels. Chas: Shia LaBeouf. Midnite: Djimon Hounsou. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Hand that Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: A widow poses as a nanny to seek revenge against a new mother, who does not know that their pasts are intertwined. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: Trippy adaptation of the cult sci-fi adventure follows an alien (Mos Def) and an earthling (Martin Freeman) on a cosmic joyride through space. Sam Rockwell, Zooey Deschanel. Directed by Garth Jennings and co-scripted by Douglas Adams, the author of the original texts upon which the film is based. The animatronic creatures were designed by Jim Henson's Creature Shop. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two daffy adult sisters, one an irresponsible single mom and the other a kindhearted nurse, decide to throw one last wild party at their childhood home before it's sold by their parents. However, their bash ends up going disastrously awry. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and later finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best. (cc)(n)

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: A hapless chap who doesn't have any male friends to serve as best man at his wedding meets a freewheeling fun-loving guy who just might fill the bill, but their chummy, male-bonding camaraderie just might impact his relationship with his bride-to-be. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.desc: Double bill. When Les and team awesomise the school's boring teacher, they unwittingly unleash the jealousy of the school's coolest teacher. Then, Lars is kicked out of the glee club because his singing is too awesome, so the team swaps his voice for that of tone deaf Les to brighten up the usually boring Spring Concert

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy has to learn a valuable lesson about respect and humility after accidently breaking his sword. Then, a freaky new exchange student threatens to ruin Randy and Howard's friendship

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: Double bill. Wander tries to resist the temptation to open a box he's meant to deliver. Then, Wander gets lost on a dangerous planet and Sylvia uses his magical hat to find him

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer loses his guitar-pick necklace and cannot see Billy any more. Billy is so desperate for attention he inadvertently convinces Hugh and Jane the house is haunted. Then, Spencer enters a Halloween competition to find the best haunted house. The winner gets to work with a famous special effects director and Lolo is determined to thwart Spencer

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer gets what he deserves when he cons Hugh into taking him on a camping trip so he can shoot a desert-themed horror movie

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: Dial B for Babysitter/The Grass Is Always Meaner.
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat sabotages Old Lady Munson's efforts to earn money doing her gardening. Kat sees an opportunity to kill three birds with one stone when Old Lady Munson comes over to babysit with her dog, Growler

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop must convince his father that he is not the one causing the destruction by staying with him at all times, but this puts him in the line of fire. Meanwhile, Coop and Dennis use their knowledge of the forest to lead Kat into confrontations with nature

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy gets revenge on a French exchange student who stole his internet fame. Then, a robot dressed as a rival school's pupil snatches the school's chess record

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Raiders of the Lost Nomicon/Rise of the Planet of the Robo-Apes.
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy loses the Nomicon and must retrieve it. He wants to ride a new roller coaster, but first must stop a Robo-Ape uprising

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Boyster sneezes blue ink when he has a cold - and turns Alicia's drawings blue. Then, magic becomes Rafik's new hobby, but his audition attracts the attention of an evil, ambitious magician

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Kings of Kinkow, Brady and Boomer are determined to bring their Christmas traditions to the island, and promise the islanders there will be presents for everyone. They discover an elf tree in the jungle and ask the elves to make the toys, but when they only produce one bike in an entire week, the kings are forced to set up a toy-making production line in the plaza and put the elves to work. Needless to say, it doesn't go down too well

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: The Kings hear they are known in Chicago for throwing the worst ever party, so decide to throw the best ever beach party. However, it results in their friends being hunted by a Giant Kinkow Sand Maggot

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys find a way to become part of a video game - and drag Candace in too

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace becomes jealous when Jeremy appears in a TV commercial

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys build a car wash to help Isabella raise money for charity

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Perry is relocated to track a new villain called the Regurgitator, but Candace thinks his disappearance is her fault

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The Flynns go on a sailing trip and end up being shipwrecked

programme.title: Star Wars Freemaker Adventures
programme.desc: Rowan is captured by Graballa the Hutt, while attempting to retrieve a Kyber Saber Crystal from an asteroid field

programme.title: Star Wars Freemaker Adventures
programme.desc: When Zander takes a classic starfighter out for a joyride, he winds up in the clutches of Darth Vader

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.sub-title: Marvel's Avengers: Ultron Revolution: Into the Future.
programme.desc: Trapped in the 30th century, the Avengers set out to beat evil warlord Kang the Conqueror and get back to their own time

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.sub-title: Marvel's Avengers: Ultron Revolution: Seeing Double.
programme.desc: Black Widow comes face to face with Yelena Belova who - in her determination to create the ultimate weapon - turns Hulk into Winter Hulk

programme.title: Marvel's Ant-Man
programme.desc: Despite Hank Pym's warning, Ant-Man manages to spill soup on his suit, sending him into a size-changing frenzy while trying to defeat the nefarious Egghead

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.sub-title: Me and You and a Dog Named Cosmo.
programme.desc: Cosmo goes undercover on the Believer Flagship, but loses his powers when his cover is blown

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.sub-title: Ultimate Spider-Man vs The Sinister Six: Beached.
programme.desc: Spider-Man and Iron Spider end up stranded on a desert island where multiple sand men attack. It transpires Doc Ock has Flint Marko - Sandman - trapped and is in control of the Sandman group, so the duo set out to rescue him

programme.title: Star Wars Rebels
programme.desc: Part two of two. After finding a missing rebel team member, the Ghost crew discovers another surprise on Geonosis, and work to conceal it from Imperial forces

programme.title: Star Wars Rebels
programme.desc: Zeb and Chopper bring a damaged droid, found in the Atollon wilderness back to base, only to discover that the droid is a new Imperial probe programmed to spy on and destroy rebels

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.sub-title: Lab Rats: Bionic Island: Spike v Spikette.
programme.desc: Spike refuses to subdue a female bionic student with the same commando app as Chase, as he regards himself a gentleman, so the Lab Rats install it in Bree and set the stage for a bionic girl fight

programme.title: Walk the Prank

programme.title: My Life
programme.desc: With just 2 years' experience, Scottish teenager Iona has only five months to prepare for the biggest international competition of her life, the World Junior Surf Championships in the Azores, Portugal. It's a race against time as she trains in sub-zero conditions and battles the unpredictable seas of her home shores to find the perfect wave. It's punishing but day after day Iona dons her wetsuit and dives in. But surfing off Scotland's coast is a world away from the warm, volcanic waters of the Azores, where Iona will be up against the gnarliest (treacherous) waves she has ever faced as well as some of the most experienced and fearless surfers on the planet. Determined not to let herself or her country down, will Iona master the surf - and the pressure - to come home a champion?

programme.title: The Furchester Hotel
programme.desc: It's just another day at the Furchester Hotel, that is until the Furball, a bouncing furry monster ball, arrives in a flurry of bouncing and chanting! Soon all the Furchesters are jumping and chanting 'Furball!' too. Elmo asks why they are all shouting 'Furball' and Furgus says that it's because the Furball has arrived, it's the best game ever, whenever he turns up at the hotel they all play a game of 'Furball', he's very excited and goes to get his Furball equipment bag and everything is there except his Furball shoes. Furgus and Funella go to look for his shoes and tell Phoebe and Elmo to keep an eye on the Furball and not let him out of their sight. Just at that moment, the Furball disappears, only for them to spot him up on the balcony, they're soon chasing him all over the hotel. Phoebe decides to look in her Dad's Furball bag and finds a Furball net, they hear boinging and get ready to pounce, but they catch a very suspicious looking rabbit instead. Cookie Monster then comes along and tells them to use Furball bait - a cookie! They put the cookie in the Furball net and wait, but instead of catching a Furball they catch Cookie Monster instead, with which he remembers that cookies are Cookie Monster bait, not Furball bait

programme.title: School of Roars

programme.title: Where in the World
programme.sub-title: Liza, Tyra and Hamza: Liza Makes Blueberry Pancakes.
programme.desc: In this programme we visit three children who are all having a fascinating day out. In Russia, seven-year-old Liza picks blueberries with her grandma - and helps turn them into delicious pancakes. In Ghana, Tyra, who's five, goes to the market with her mum and learns how to do the shopping. And in Jordan, Hamza, who's eight, has a day out in town with his dad, and buys a lovely present for his baby sister, Mimi. We see that although children live in different countries, may look different and speak different languages, the joys and discoveries of childhood are universal
